Details.Name: sc_airmiles_details
Details.Feature: Get 1 air miles (local spend) with every S$1 spent with a min. spend of $1,500 monthlyGet 2 air miles Get 1 air miles (local spend) with every S$1 spent with a min. spend of $1,500 monthly
Get 2 air miles (overseas spend) with every S$1 spent with a min. spend of $1,500 monthly
Redeem OCBC$ for a host of travel privileges such as free hotel stay packages, air tickets and many more
Convert OCBC$ to KrisFlyer miles (10,000 OCBC$ = 4,000 KrisFlyer miles)

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
